price: Oni žele utrnuti Allahovo svjetlo ustima svojim, a Allah će upotpuniti svjetlo Svoje, makar to mrzili nevjernici.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ لِيُطۡفِـُٔواْ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَٱللَّهُ مُتِمُّ نُورِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna liyuṭ'fiū nūra al-lahi bi-afwāhihim wal-lahu mutimmu nūrihi walaw kariha al-kāfirūna
